<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from/><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>6</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-08 11:21:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4eb46e7adb87d810ba15a35305961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevTools" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevTools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_4eb46e7adb87d810ba15a35305961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-26 06:33:29</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="DevTools - IsUserHasRoleExactly">4873aef6db87d810ba15a35305961900</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=4eb46e7adb87d810ba15a35305961937"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>4eb46e7adb87d810ba15a35305961937</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-08 11:21:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>19c4ae7adb87d810ba15a35305961955</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-23 11:55:36</sys_updated_on><value>var strLog = '';
function Log(strText)
{
	strLog = strLog + "\n" + strText;
}
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var bResult = true;
	
	function TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly(vInput, vExpected)
	{
		Log('TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly');
		Log('Input: '+vInput);
		Log('Expected: '+vExpected);
		var vResult = IsUserHasRoleExactly(vInput);
		Log('Result  : '+vResult);
		if (vResult != vExpected)
		{
			bResult = false;
			Log('Test case FAILED');
		}
		Log('');
	}

	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly(null,false);
	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly('',false);
	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly('itil_admin',false);
	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly('itil',true);
	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly('admin',false);
	
	// Repeat to check cache behaviour
	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly('itil',true);
	TestCase_IsUserHasRoleExactly('admin',false);

	
	stepResult.setOutputMessage(strLog);
	return bResult;
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>4eb46e7adb87d810ba15a35305961937</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-08 11:21:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>55c4ae7adb87d810ba15a35305961955</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-08 11:21:09</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
